title: Goodbye Role Selection?
body: I think we are moving beyond on it, and that is a good thing.  Pick for matchups and comps and go where and play how the game dictates.  Sounds so good, LoL is coming back into form.

replies.body: A new group of hard scaling carries and the game will be better than ever.  Also freeing the supports is great.  Still too much damage, but things are definitely going in the right direction.

Pyke is a great example of this. I get a kill early, get mobi boots, and go mid or top for an early kill or assist there too! It works 80% of the time. Just make sure your adc is not an idiot, and gets themself killed. Or have your jg show bot so enemy laners feel safe while your adc does not get killed.
